title: Kidou Shinsengumi Moeyo Ken TV
original_name: 機動新撰組 萌えよ剣 TV
opening_song: "時代の無双花 [Toki no Musoubana]" by Hiromi Satou
ending_song: "始まりの風よ吹け [Hajimari no Kaze yo Fuke]" by Misato Fujiya
sinopse: Set in an alternate version of the Meiji Era, a boy named Sakamoto Ryunosuke returns to Kyoto from Shanghai with his monster (youkai) Nekomaru. The law states that in order to live freely with humans, a youkai must be liscensed. The Kidou Shinsengumi Co. Ltd. is responsible for the capture of unliscensed youkais but must fight with the Tsubamegumi, who resents the new law. It turns out that Ryunosuke is the son of the owner of the Shinsengumis.
